spec.title: CSS Backgrounds and Borders Module Level 4

properties.name: background-position
properties.computedValue: see individual properties

properties.name: background-position-x

properties.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

properties.name: background-position-y

properties.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

properties.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

properties.name: background-position-block
properties.percentages: refer to size of background positioning area minus size of background image
properties.computedValue: A list, each item consisting of: an offset given as a computed <length-percentage> value, plus an origin keyword

properties.computedValue: as specified

properties.name: border-color
properties.computedValue: see individual properties

properties.name: border-radius
properties.appliesTo: all elements, except table element when border-collapse is collapse
properties.computedValue: as specified

properties.name: corner-shape
properties.appliesTo: all elements, except table element when border-collapse is collapse
properties.computedValue: as specified

values.name: round
values.prose: Border radii define a convex elliptical curve at the corner.

values.name: angle
values.prose: Border radii define a diagonal slice at the corner.

properties.name: corners
properties.computedValue: see individual properties

properties.name: border-limit
properties.value: all | [ sides | corners ] <length-percentage [0,∞]>? | [ top | right | bottom | left ] <length-percentage [0,∞]>
properties.appliesTo: all elements, except table element when border-collapse is collapse
properties.computedValue: as specified

values.name: sides
values.prose: The sides are drawn up to but not including the corners (as defined by the border radii). A length or percentage is measured from the center of each side: 50% draws the middle 50% of the border; by default the entire side is drawn.

values.name: corners
values.prose: The corners are drawn plus the specified distance into the sides if specified. A length is measured from the closest edge of the corner area. A percentage is measured from the absolute corner of the border box.

values.name: left
values.prose: For the left and right (vertical) sides, draws the entire side and corner. For the top and bottom (horizontal) sides, draws the left/right portion, as specified. Distances are measured as for corners.

values.name: right
values.prose: For the left and right (vertical) sides, draws the entire side and corner. For the top and bottom (horizontal) sides, draws the left/right portion, as specified. Distances are measured as for corners.

values.name: top
values.prose: For the top and bottom (horizontal) sides, draws the entire side and corner. For the left and right (vertical) sides, draws the top/bottom portion, as specified. Distances are measured as for corners.

values.name: bottom
values.prose: For the top and bottom (horizontal) sides, draws the entire side and corner. For the left and right (vertical) sides, draws the top/bottom portion, as specified. Distances are measured as for corners.

properties.name: border-clip
properties.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
properties.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

properties.name: border-clip-top
properties.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
properties.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

properties.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side

properties.name: border-clip-bottom

properties.name: border-clip-left
properties.percentages: refer to length of border-edge side
properties.computedValue: normal, or a list consisting of absolute lengths, or percentages as specified

values.name: <position>
values.value: [ [ left | center | right | top | bottom | start | end | <length-percentage> ] | [ left | center | right | x-start | x-end | <length-percentage> ] [ top | center | bottom | y-start | y-end | <length-percentage> ] | [ center | [ left | right | x-start | x-end ] <length-percentage>? ] && [ center | [ top | bottom | y-start | y-end ] <length-percentage>? ] | [ center | [ start | end ] <length-percentage>? ] [ center | [ start | end ] <length-percentage>? ] ]

values.name: <box>
values.prose: The background is painted within (clipped to) the specified box of the element.

values.name: text
values.prose: The background is painted within (clipped to) the intersection of the border box and the geometry of the text in the element and its in-flow and floated descendants.

values.name: border
values.prose: The background is clipped to the area painted by the border, taking border-width and border-style into account but ignoring any transparency introduced by border-color.
